alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette; Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 1:14AM CST until January 15 at 3:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow moving out of the region tonight... .Snow continues to taper off from north to south. Some blowing and drifting snow is possible where northeast winds gust up to 30 mph, especially in open and unsheltered areas. If traveling tonight, check road conditions, slow down, and be prepared for hazardous conditions due to the snow covered roads. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Wisconsin and northeast Iowa. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511ia.org in Iowa, 511mn.org in Minnesota, and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
